title: Urban Legends Hoodie
shortDescription: Premium streetwear hoodie with contemporary urban design
description:
Make a statement with our Urban Legends Hoodie. Crafted from premium cotton blend with a contemporary fit that defines modern street style. Features bold graphics, kangaroo pocket, and adjustable drawstring hood.

Perfect for layering or wearing as a statement piece. Represents the intersection of comfort, style, and urban culture.

title: Midnight Joggers
shortDescription: Sleek joggers with tapered fit and premium comfort for all-day wear
description:
Experience unparalleled comfort with our Midnight Joggers. Designed with a contemporary tapered silhouette that transitions seamlessly from gym to street. Features elastic waistband with drawstring, side pockets, and ankle zippers for a modern aesthetic.

Crafted from soft cotton blend that maintains its shape and comfort throughout the day.

specs.material: 85% Cotton, 15% Polyester with soft fleece lining

title: Metro Snapback Cap
shortDescription: Classic snapback with embroidered logo and structured crown
description:
Complete your urban look with the Metro Snapback Cap. Features classic 6-panel construction with structured crown and flat brim. Premium embroidered logo and contrast stitching add sophisticated details to this streetwear essential.

Adjustable snapback closure ensures perfect fit for all head sizes.

specs.material: 100% Cotton twill with polyester mesh panels
